channel.title: Examples of R and Python on Adaylin Alvarez

item.title: Having Fun with R and Python
item.description: Introduction Python and R are both programming languages that are extremely useful for data wrangling and analysis, especially in the realm of computational biology and bioinformatics. Although many think of these different coding languages (or coding in general) as boring and difficult to understand, I decided to introduce a little bit of humor to showcase the fun side of coding below! R and Python I will be starting in R by assigning the follow string of characters to TheBestest
